entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gimli 3:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -11.6°C
Wind: SSE 21 km/h gust 30 km/h

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16 with temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow early in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 16 with temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
